For

Still looking for the perfect app to help you stay on top of your schedules? With DNB you can achieve that and so much more.

Google Play

Key Features

Timely Schedules

Receive live notifications on your group schedules so you dont miss the meeting that matters.

Announcements

Be currents. Get updates on the happenning in your group or organisation.

Books And Resources

Get easy access to recommended textbooks, past questions, journal content or other library resources on or off campus

What we offer

Terms and conditions prompt

Stay informed on the rules for using our application before diving into it.

Tutorials Session

Early birds tutorials to get you using the app more effectively.

Simple homescreen navigation

You dont need to perform actions by rote. Navigate seamlessly even on first usage.

Timetables

View all your schedules in neatly laid our tables.

Google Maps

Access meeting location directions right from DNB.

Announcements

Access and search for all announcement easily like never before.

Featured Links

Your institutions important sites and resources all at your finger tips. No need to open the browser window.

Books

Download textbooks and other materials for free.

Past Questions

Have digital access to all past examinations question anytime and everywhere.

Navigation

Access all DNB offer in our sleek navigation menu.

About

Read about DNB and access our terms of use anytime in the app.

Feedback Session

Give us live feedback on your usage of the app so we can satisfy you more.

Greate device compatibility

Due to the responsive design and Retina ready technology built in our app, you can launch it on any devices or modern gadgets.

Comming soon

Pasquet is an flagship application for students in all levels of education through basic, secondary and teriary education. Its purpose is driven towards helping students ELIMINATE EXAMINATION FEAR AND ACing their exam.

Know your campus app

Comming soon

To satisfy your curiosity, this is a campus based application for all students in all institutions.
It provide the platform for students to share interesting views and facilities in their school with the world. This helps freshers and non-students to get aquainted with all campus facilities so they can make informed decision about their school.

Privacy and Policy

Effective Date: 1st October, 2019 Last Updated: 19th April, 2020

Introduction

I-Project leg (“us”, “we”, or “our”) operates the DNB platform. This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, uses, and disclosure of personal data when you use our service and the choices you have associated with that data. We do not collect any type of information from your neither do we use any information for various purposes.

Links to other sites.

Our service may contain links to other sites that are not operated by us. If you click on a third party link, you will be redirected to that third party’s site. We strongly advise you to review the privacy policy of every site you visit. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third party sites or services.

Changes to this privacy policy.

We may update our privacy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. We will let you know via email and/or a prominent notice on our Service, prior to the change becoming effective and update the “effective date” at the top of this Privacy Policy. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.

Terms and Conditions

Effective Date: 1st October, 2019 Last Updated: 19th April, 2020

Introduction

This standard terms and conditions written on this webpage shall manage your use of our product, DNB. These terms will be applied fully and affect your use of this product. By using this product, you agree to accept all terms and conditions written here. You must not use this product if you disagree with any of this product standard terms and conditions. Individuals outside the confines of the University of Ghana, College of Education, Distance Education, Accra learning center, or unspicified tertiary schools are not allowed to use this product.

Restrictions.

No warranties.

I-Project leg, including its officers, directors and employees shall not be held liable for any indirect, consequential or special liability arising out of or any way related to your use of this product.
